isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - OPERATION - MONITOR MODULE

svcproc.title: MONITOR MODULE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 2 for all items in parentheses.

The monitor module monitors the electrical integrity of the Hydro-Max™ booster backup pump (Item 5), relay (Item 7) and flow switch (Item 6) system. If the backup pump is running, the monitor module is the device that turns on the warning light in the vehicle instrument panel. The monitor module continuously monitors the backup pump electrical ground. If the ground path is interrupted, the monitor module will turn on the warning light in the vehicle instrument panel. The monitor module also checks to make sure that the backup pump gets voltage when the ignition switch is turned on, but the engine has not started. If the monitor module does not sense voltage at the backup pump, it will turn on the warning light in the vehicle instrument panel. The monitor module also monitors the performance of the brake switch on the brake pedal. For a more detailed explanation of the monitor module, refer to GROUP 08 - ELECTRICAL in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
